Author: michaelneale
Content: true - although I think if people are put off a mobile platform cause of the initial incarnation of a programming language for it, then perhaps they aren't really that interested in the apps (only in the tech).

Author: watmough
Content: This is really cool. It works great in FF 2.0.11, but looks seriously messed up in FF 3.0b2.

Author: magicseeker
Content: Exactly. And I'd wonder if some sort of direct Scala -> Dalvik compilation could work around some of the crufty bits of Scala (like its lack of proper tail recursion) and of Android (like all of the performance tuning suggestions in the SDK documentation).

Author: kkim
Content: They make it sounds as if being an administrator is fun.  Surely the best job in physics is to be someone who gets to spend nearly all of their time doing research and has job security and few responsibilities.
